name: Iron Lex
description:
Coinslot 1/1 from the NostaLex Collection.

NostaLex: A body of work by the artist Coinslot that consist of 250 hand-drawn 1/1 pieces of his most recognized character, Lex the Copy Cat, inspired by childhood memories and memorabilia. Welcome to the Slot Gang fam.

All rights pertaining to the artwork and IP belongs to Coinslot Worldwide Inc.
